showScoreExcerpt:
At over two hours, you may...find that Life of Pi is a bit longer than its material demands. And, if you’re planning to bring the kids, remember that the play not only contains serious themes,...but gruesome scenes involving the bloody fate of animal victims...Perhaps you’ve pondered the taste of pie in Sweeney Todd; here’s a chance to consider...,the taste of Pi.
